title: How to Make a Blended Strawberry Ice Cream Dessert

steps.headline: Buy strawberry ice cream that you think is lovely and tasty.
steps.description: Alternatively, you could buy your recipient's favourite strawberry ice cream, it's their birthday after all. Choose a brand that costs a little more, the more expensive a strawberry ice cream is, the better it seems to taste according to some who assume this is because more expensive ice cream is quality. Make your own strawberry ice cream if you really want to make an effort for your recipient's birthday.

steps.headline: Put three scoops of strawberry ice cream into a blender.
steps.description: Adding vanilla extract or beans or any other type of vanilla with it has a yummy effect.

steps.headline: Blend well, until the strawberry ice cream is smooth.
Put the milkshake into small glasses, or a mug as illustrated, and leave in the fridge to get a little cold.
steps.description: Do this for a few minutes.

steps.headline: Add lots of whipped cream on the top, if you have a real strawberry put it into the whipped cream.
Add a jumbo straw and sprinkles if desired.

text: Buy strawberry ice cream that you think is lovely and tasty. Alternatively, you could buy your recipient's favourite strawberry ice cream, it's their birthday after all. Choose a brand that costs a little more, the more expensive a strawberry ice cream is, the better it seems to taste according to some who assume this is because more expensive ice cream is quality. Make your own strawberry ice cream if you really want to make an effort for your recipient's birthday. Put three scoops of strawberry ice cream into a blender. Adding vanilla extract or beans or any other type of vanilla with it has a yummy effect. Blend well, until the strawberry ice cream is smooth.  Put the milkshake into small glasses, or a mug as illustrated, and leave in the fridge to get a little cold. Do this for a few minutes. Add lots of whipped cream on the top, if you have a real strawberry put it into the whipped cream.  Add a jumbo straw and sprinkles if desired.
